sentences.sContent: He answered all the lawyer’s questions in a dull monotone.
sentences.sCn: 他用单调的语气回答了律师所有的问题。

sentences.sContent: He was seen on TV delivering platitudes about the crisis in a monotone voice.
sentences.sCn: 人们看到他在电视上念经似地就危机问题老调重弹。

words.tran: 单调的，无抑扬顿挫的；无变化的
单调的；无变化的；产生单音调的
单音节的；一音节的；简短的

trans.tranOther: a sound or way of speaking or singing that continues on the same note without getting any louder or softer, and therefore sounds very boring
A monotone sound or surface does not have any variation in its tone or colour
